roleset.name: to climb awkwardly
roleset.note: CLAMBER-V NOTES: Frames file for 'clamber' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from clamber.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: As for the ride back to camp , our pilot and all the other French-speaking passengers clambered into the chase car .
example.arg: our pilot and all the other French-speaking passengers
